post_title: WTB: Reds and Pirates with Specific Backs
post_content:
Looking for the following front / back combos. If anyone has these for sale or trade, please let me know:

Reds
Bob Spade: Sweet Cap 150/25 or Hindu
Clark Griffith (portrait): Sweet Cap 150/25 or Hindu

Pirates
Tommy Leach (portrait): Hindu
Lefty Leifield (pitching): Sweet Cap 350/25, Sweet Cap 350/30 or Hindu
Vic Willis: Old Mill
Fred Clarke (portrait): Old Mill
Fred Clarke (batting): Old Mill
